mapper.sql: SELECT prva.parent_transaction_id, prva.document_number, prva.document_id, prva.document_line_number, prva.document_line_id, prva.organization_id, prva.quantity, prva.unit_of_measure, getdate() as transaction_date, prva.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID, prva.ITEM_NUMBER, prva.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, prva.ERP_FLAG, prva.ERP_FLAG_DATE, prva.REMARK, prva.return_vendor_id, prva.subinventory_code, prva.error_infor, (SELECT esb.LOT_CONTROL_CODE FROM sync_egp_system_items_b esb WHERE esb.ORGANIZATION_ID = prva.organization_id AND esb.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = prva.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID) AS lot_control_code FROM mes_po_return_vendor_all prva
mapper.select:
and (prva.ERP_FLAG = 0 or prva.ERP_FLAG = 2 or prva.ERP_FLAG_WORK = 0 or prva.ERP_FLAG_WORK = 2)
order by prva.ERP_FLAG asc
SELECT COUNT (WORK_ORDER_ID) FROM sync_po_lines_all WHERE PO_HEADER_ID = #{documentId} AND PO_LINE_ID = #{documentLineId} and WORK_ORDER_ID > 0
select ORGANIZATION_CODE from sync_inv_org_parameters where ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId}

SELECT wwob.work_order_number, wwop.OPERATION_SEQ_NUMBER AS wo_operation_sequence_number, (SELECT esb.LOT_CONTROL_CODE FROM sync_egp_system_items_b esb WHERE esb.ORGANIZATION_ID = wwob.organization_id AND esb.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID = wwob.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID) AS LOT_CONTROL_CODE FROM sync_wie_wo_operations_b wwop, sync_wie_work_orders_b wwob, sync_po_lines_all prv WHERE 1 = 1 AND wwop.WORK_ORDER_ID = wwob.WORK_ORDER_ID AND wwop.ORGANIZATION_ID = wwob.ORGANIZATION_ID AND prv.organization_id = wwob.ORGANIZATION_ID AND prv.WORK_ORDER_ID = wwob.WORK_ORDER_ID AND wwop.AUTO_TRANSACT_FLAG = 'N' AND prv.PO_HEADER_ID = #{documentId} AND prv.PO_LINE_ID = #{documentLineId} ORDER BY wwop.OPERATION_SEQ_NUMBER desc
